articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Greetings to Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and President of Syria, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the independence of Syria.
					 The message said: 
					
					 Please accept my warm felicitations to you and your people on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the independence of Syria, the national holiday of its people.
					
					 The people of the DPRK always have good feelings toward friendly Syria and wish its people steady successes in their cause of defending the sovereignty and territorial integrity of their country and achieving progress and realizing its modernization.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to express belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wish you good health and happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends worth 199,000,000 yen for the democratic national education of the children of Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The educational aid fund and stipends sent by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in 155 installments so far total 46,410,223,000 yen.

articles.title: Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian President 
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greetings to Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message noted that the Syrian people have achieved great successes in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country, consolidate the national independence and achieve the Arab unity and regional peace and security under Bashar Al-Assad's leadership.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow strong as required by the new century and in line with the desire of the peoples of the two countries, Kim sincerely wished him and the Syrian people steady successes in the work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Syria
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Syria
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il Thursday sent a message of greetings to Muhammad Nazi Otri, Prime Minister of Syria, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message wished the Syrian government and people great success in the work for protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and building modern Syria and expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing gave a reception on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there on invitation were Chen Zhili, vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and others. 
					
					 Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of the embassy were present there. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador said in his speech at the reception that the army and the people of the DPRK are bringing about a new great revolutionary surge on all fronts of socialist construction to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 under the banner of Songun after reelecting Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK's recent successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 was a great historic event which fully demonstrated the might of the country and made the first gun salute heralding the victory in the drive to build a great prosperous powerful nation, he stressed. 
					
					 He wished the Chinese people success in the socialist modernization drive under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary, reiterating the will of the Korean people to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and China. 
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress recalled in his speech that President Kim Il Sung enjoyed the unquestioned support and reverence of the Korean people as the founder and leader of the WPK, the DPRK and the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Warmly congratulating Kim Jong Il on his recent reelection as chairman of the NDC, he wholeheartedly hoped that the fraternal Korean people would achieve their goal to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President. 
					
					 He stressed that the Chinese people would steadily inject fresh energy and vitality into the Sino-DPRK friendship and join the Korean people in carving out a more beautiful morrow of the bilateral relations with the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship" as a momentum.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russian Philosophy Association led by Gennadi Astakhov arrived here on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Friendship Amusement Games Held
articles.content:
Friendship Amusement Games Held
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Friendship amusement games of participants in the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants enjoyed the games, divided into "Red" and "Blue" teams.
					
					 Amid the playing of such games as running in bag, walking with balloon on head, kicking rugby ball, partner-finding and tug-of-war, the spectators warmly cheered the players, raising the morale.
					
					 Acrobats, students and children of the DPRK presented colorful art pieces, whipping up the mood of the games.
					
					 Encouraged by such support, the players of both teams displayed their wisdom and skills to the full, keeping step with each other.
					
					 At the end of the games, artistes of different countries and overseas compatriot artistes merrily danced with students and children to the melody of waltz.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Remember Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the port of Nampho Wednesday to remember President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 It was attended by captains and crew members of a Malta-flagged ship and Panama-flagged ships.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting highly praised the President as the greatest man who fathered the immortal Juche idea and led the Korean revolution and socialist construction to victory.
					
					 The President performed great exploits on behalf of the times and history and for the cause of global independence, always finding himself among people, they stressed and went on:
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK's successful putting of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit at one go is the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, they laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of the President standing in Nampho City and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Performance Given by Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Performance Given by Schoolchildren
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A performance of art group members of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace was given on Wednesday to commemorate the 97th anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage of performance, which began with prelude "The Day of the Sun, Our Holiday", were quartet "Beautiful Mangyongdae", dance "Art Troupe of the Children's Corps" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented the ardent yearning and deep reverence for Kim Il Sung who laid the base for the eternal life of all generations in this land and dedicated all his life to the happiness of posterity.
					
					 Among the repertoire were numbers reminding the audience of the immortal feats of leader Kim Jong Il who is traveling an endless journey of Songun.
					
					 The performers well represented in songs and dances the happy looks of children in the era of Songun who are growing up without nothing to envy in the world under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Present to enjoy the performance were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and youths and students in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Camping of Schoolchildren Starts
articles.content:
Camping of Schoolchildren Starts
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Camping for this year has begun at children's camps across the country on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The camps have been fully equipped with all conditions needed for camping to receive schoolchildren.
					
					 A meeting to receive campers took place at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp on Wednesday.
					
					A reporter and speakers at the meeting said that schoolchildren have spent the pleasant days of camping every year under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is traveling an endless journey of Songun for the future of the country and happiness of posterity.
					
					 They stressed the need for schoolchildren to train their body and mind and consolidate their school knowledge through mountaineering, study tour and other diverse activities and thus well prepare themselves to be reliable pillars of Songun Korea with ample knowledge, high morality and strong body.
					
					 Similar meetings were held at other camps across the country, including the Songdowon International Children's Camp and Yonphungho, Sokam, Sohungho and Soho Children's Camps.

articles.title: Mosaics Portraying Peerlessly Great Persons Erected
articles.content:
Mosaics Portraying Peerlessly Great Persons Erected
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were erected at different units.
					 The mosaic "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" erected in Chongsu area of Sakju County portrays the smiling President who devoted his whole life to the liberation and prosperity of the country and freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					 The mosaic "President Kim Il Sung guiding a general meeting of the party cell of Hajang village in Jangsan-ri" was erected at the Jangsan Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County.
					
					 Also erected at the Korean Computer Centre was the mosaic depicting the President and Kim Jong Il standing on Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, their faces beaming with a broad smile, while picturing the morrow of the prospering country to themselves. 
					
					 The unveiling ceremonies were held at the relevant units.

articles.title: Building of Socialist Paradise Called for
articles.content:
Building of Socialist Paradise Called for
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun editorially call for glorifying the immortal revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung and his exploits generation after generation and turning the DPRK into a socialist paradise where people fully enjoy happiness.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that it is thanks to this day that the DPRK, once eclipsed on the world map, came to demonstrate before the whole world its might as a people-centered socialist country taking the lead in carving out the era of independence and there began a new history of profound love for people on this land.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader of the revolution who clearly indicated the road of carving out the independent destiny of the Korean people and benevolent father who showed profound love for them and devoted his all to their happiness, the daily says, and goes on:
					
					 Just as the history of the sun will last forever, the revolutionary history and exploits of Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the happiness of the people will shine forever.
					
					 The President's noble cause of love for people is now being successfully carried forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the President's history of love for people is given steady continuity generation after generation and all what the President desired is becoming a brilliant reality on this land.
					
					 The DPRK successfully launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 recently while resolutely foiling the U.S. imperialists' and their followers' vicious political, military and diplomatic pressure and obstructions. This represents a victory of the national historic significance, a fruition of Kim Jong Il's faith and will for independence and matchless courage and pluck, and a great historic event which signified a prelude to opening the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					 The wise guidance provided by Kim Jong Il to steer Songun Korea only along the ever-victorious road with his Juche-based faith unshakable in any tempest of history is bringing earlier the bright future when the people will lead an independent and happy life.
					
					 No force on earth can hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK and its people towards the morrow of a thriving nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minju Joson says that as Kim Jong Il is leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people the revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to win final victory and the President's undying exploits will shine forever along with the victorious advance of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, ministries of governments, organizations and personages of different circles sent baskets of flowers to DPRK missions in their countries between April 7 and 10 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					They included: the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the Communist Party, the Defence Ministry, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development and the Department of International Cooperation of the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam, the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association and the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group; the People's Party, the FUNCINPEC Party, the Khmer Democratic Party and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Cambodia; the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar; the Party for Unity and Progress and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Guinea; the Government of Geneva Canton of Switzerland; the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party and the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Mexico, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association; the vice-prime minister and concurrently defence minister and the vice-prime minister and concurrently foreign minister of Laos; an advisor to the Cambodian prime minister; and the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.

articles.title: Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Jong Il by Ecuadorian Provincial Government
articles.content:
Honorary Citizenship Awarded to Kim Jong Il by Ecuadorian Provincial Government
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Cotopaxi Province of Ecuador decided to award honorary citizenship to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 A special meeting of the provincial government was held on April 7 to decide on the conferment of the honorary citizenship upon Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A decision on awarding honorary citizenship to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It said that  Cotopaxi Province has the pleasure to award its honorary citizenship to Kim Jong Il, successor to President Kim Il Sung's  cause of Juche and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the  most significant and historic day of the Korean people.
					
					 The decision was conveyed to the head of the DPRK group for assistance in Koryo medicine active in Ecuador.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in Shenyang on April 13 to commemorate the 97th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chairman Yang Yong Dong and officials of the above-said general association, representatives of different branches of the Liaoning Regional Association, compatriots and the DPRK consul-general in Shenyang. 
					
					 Hwang Yong Du, chairman of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, said in his report that the Koreans in China are most significantly commemorating the 97th birth anniversary of the President as the greatest holiday of the nation when the people in the motherland are greatly excited by the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2. 
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il's reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly marked the historic event of epochal significance in the cause of building the Juche-oriented army and the development of the revolution and a great auspicious event of the nation. 
					
					 He called upon the Koreans in China to turn out as one in the patriotic movement for the prosperity of the country and the country's reunification this significant year, keeping pace with the struggle of the people in the motherland, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 Then followed a film show. 
					
					Prior to the meeting, a photo exhibition titled "General Secretary Kim Jong Il and DPRK Today" was held.

articles.title: Meeting Held by General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Meeting Held by General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in China on Sunday to warmly congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the above-said association, officials, representatives of different branches of the Liaoning Regional Association, compatriots and the DPRK consul-general in Shenyang.
					
					 Yang Yong Dong said in his report that the Koreans in China were immensely excited and pleased to hear the happy news that Kim Jong Il was reelected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly .
					
					 He underscored the need for the Koreans in China to wage a dynamic patriotic movement for the prosperity and the independent reunification of the country, keeping pace with the people in the motherland effecting a great leap forward on all fronts for building a great prosperous powerful nation, highly proud of having Kim Jong Il at the top post of the DPRK. 
					
					 He called upon all of them to devote themselves to the struggle for firmly defending and glorifying the socialist system, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Denmark and the Czech Republic issued statements on April 8 in celebration of the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association in its statement noted that the DPRK successfully put its earth satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit, adding: The DPRK is a sovereign and independent state with the right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Nobody has authority to violate this right of the DPRK, and the West's intervention and accusation against its sovereignty will only result in tension and confrontation in the Korean Peninsula, the statement warned.
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association in its statement expressed full support for the DPRK's policy of peaceful space development, saying that the association extends warm congratulations to the Korean people on their signal achievement made in the field of space science and technology.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung was held in Nepal, an explanation meeting on his greatness, a film show and a photo exhibition in Iran and a lecture in Democratic Congo between April 4 and 9 to commemorate the anniversary of his birth.
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare of Nepal said that they are learning a great deal from the long history and precious and rich experience of the Korean revolution led by the President.
					
					 Ram K. Karmacharya, president of the National Press Club of Nepal, praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader who performed undying feats for the progressive humankind, saying that the DPRK is a country reliably guaranteeing peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, explained in detail about the immortal feats performed by the President for the country and the revolution, stressing that the powerful foundations of political, military, economic and all other fields socialist Korea is depending on would have been unthinkable without his farsightedness and distinguished leadership.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was DPRK film "Faith of Korea".
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in Nepal.

articles.title: French Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
French Preparatory Committee for Commemorating Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung Formed
 Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of a French preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was held in Paris on April 10.
					 Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee and the general secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League vice-chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the immortal exploits performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and conduct positive activities in support of the just cause of Korean people waging a dynamic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieving national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il participa en velada de fuegos artificiales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il participa en velada de fuegos artificiales
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 14 por la noche a la ribera del rio Taedong la velada de fuegos artificiales "Lluvia de chispas de la gran potencia prospera" en conmemoracion del 97o aniversario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  A la orilla del rio Taedong y en la calle en el lado opuesto al Monumento a la Idea Juche estaban conglomerados cientos de miles de ciudadanos de distintos sectores para presenciar la velada.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, hizo su aparicion en la graderia.
					
					  El felicito calidamente a los habitantes, que acogen el Dia del Sol, maxima fiesta nacional, respondiendo cordialmente con la mano alzada a la aclamacion hospitalaria de ellos.
					
					  Aparecieron tambien en la graderia los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Il Chol, Yang Hyong Sop y Kim Ki Nam.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes igualmente los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, militares del ejercito popular, funcionarios de los dominios de la ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, benemeritos, el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en ultramar y compatriotas radicados en el extranjero.
					
					  Fueron invitados los huespedes extranjeros, los representantes diplomaticos de diversos paises y los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.
					
					  Mientras se interpretaba la melodia solemne de la "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y de "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", se tiro al cielo un rayo de fuego artificial que encendio la antorcha del Monumento a la Idea Juche.
					
					  Junto con la estruendosa detonacion, los fuegos artificiales de distintos colores y formas escenificaron en el cielo nocturno un mundo artisticamente maravilloso del fuego.
					
					  Los fuegos artificiales, que explotaban sucesivamente mostrando en el cielo el climax de maravillas y elegancia, iluminaron todo el mundo reflejando la ardiente adoracion del pueblo coreano al Presidente Kim Il Sung, heroe legendario sin par y eterno Sol de la nacion.
					
					  Con el paso del tiempo, los fuegos artificiales de distintos colores adornaron mas hermosamente el cielo nocturno de la capital haciendo imaginar un  gran jardin de las flores de todo tipo.
					
					  La velada, que infundia la conviccion y el optimismo del triunfo en el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea prometiendo el brillante futuro de la revolucion coreana, conmovio mucho a los espectadores.
					
					  Terminada la velada, se desataron las aclamaciones de "!Viva!" de los militares y habitantes hacia el Dirigente Kim Jong Il que estremecian el cielo y la tierra escenificando el torrente de fidelidad en la noche de Pyongyang.
					
					   El Dirigente respondio cordialmente con la mano a las aclamaciones de la multitud.
					
					   Ese acto mostro energicamente la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de enaltecer eternamente al Presidente como Sol de la nacion,  glorificar para siempre sus inmortales hazanas revolucionarias y cumplir a toda costa la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera y la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Dirigente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente de Siria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita al presidente de Siria
  Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, con motivo del 63o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					  La misiva senala:
					
					  Hago llegar a Usted y al pueblo de vuestro pais mi calurosa felicitacion en ocasion del aniversario 63 de la independencia de Siria, fiesta nacional del pueblo siriaco.
					
					  Nuestro pueblo se muestra siempre benevolo con el amistoso pais vuestro y desea al pueblo siriaco que logre incesantes exitos en el cumplimiento de su causa por defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais y alcanzar el desarrollo y la modernizacion.
					
					  Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar mi conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises continuaran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose y desearle de todo corazon a Usted, la buena salud y felicidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia subsidios escolares y becas a hijos de coreanos en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia subsidios escolares y becas a hijos de coreanos en Japon
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 97 del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) los subsidios escolares y becas equivalentes a 199 millones de yen (moneda japonesa) para la educacion nacional democratica de los hijos de los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					  La suma de los subsidios escolares y becas, que el Presidente y el Dirigente enviaron en 155 ocasiones hasta la fecha a la Chongryon para el particular, llega a 46 mil 410 millones 223 mil yen.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Vishwanath
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de Vishwanath
  Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Vishwanath, de visita en Corea, con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  El visitante lo entrego el dia 16 a un funcionario coreano.
